name: The Broken Comet Bar
description: A bar in the middle of nowhere. A place to meet racers, mechanics, and shady characters.

name: 404 Tech Pit
description: A mechanic shop where you can find the best parts for your ship.

name: Aero-Gate Vector 9
description: A gate of spaceship arrivals and departures terminal.

name: Midnight Track
description: Taria: Midnight track, orbital shadow. Win — I talk. Lose — forget her name.

name: Industrial Zone
description:
Joan: Experimental ship hull. Pulled from a test bay we weren’t supposed to touch.
Sonya didn’t leave feedback... or a trail.
If it holds, it’s yours.
Just don’t ask where it came from.

name: The Ruins
description: Nolan: The track winds through the old industrial sector, tight turns and broken pathways. If you clear the debt, I’ll fix that file for you.

name: The Abyss
description: Blaze through a corporate maintenance corridor. Trigger scanners, make noise, draw all the heat — while Roxy cracks their server for Sonya’s coordinates.

name: Encrypted Audio Log
description: Corrupted recording of Sonya’s last words in the bar.

name: Accepting agent money
description:
You took the credits. Enough to disappear, start fresh, forget her name.
The mystery stays buried — and so does the truth.

name: Roxy success
description:
The last drone veers off — noise was enough. Sena’s breach worked.
She sends a ping: “Got it. Sonya’s signal traces back to Volaris-3. Abandoned station, deep storm sector. Hope you’re ready.” It looks like the search just got real.

name: Drones have captured you and Roxy
description:
The drones swarm faster than you can react.
Heavy restraints clamp onto your arms; Roxy curses, thrashing beside you.
No hacking, no running — this time, they have you both.
